blog.description: I am Quinn. I am 24, Irish, in a relationship. I am queer, I am nonbinary, and I am disabled. My best friend is a chihuahua called Magical Harper. If you're under 18 you should get off my blog, stuff gets Adult in here. I really love plants. Proud Heathen. Folkish can fuck off. We love and respect women and minorities in this house of all backgrounds, ethnicities and histories.      I swear a fucking lot. But talk to me, I like making friends.

summary: Ryan Reynolds compara su cara con la de Detective Pikachu
title: Ryan Reynolds compara su cara con la de Detective Pikachu
body:
Ryan Reynolds compara su cara con la de Detective Pikachu

El actor Ryan Reynolds que se encuentra en estos momentos en la cresta de la ola gracias a las dos entregas de Deadpool, será quien preste su voz a Detective Pikachu. La nueva película del universo Pokémon, ahora mezclando acción real con animación, mostrará una versión más socarrona del adorable protagonista eléctrico.

Además de la voz, Reynolds ha prestado su cara y gestos para la…

View On WordPress

blog.description:
Thomas. 23. Italian. Male. Feminist. Literal Pile of Salt. Asexual. Aromantic. Bisexual. Massive Nerd.
English isn't my first language. Ravenclaw. Evil Overlord. I tend to be Sappy about my OTPs and Salty about my NOTPs.

summary: "Partners?! I don't need another partner, I'm perfectly fine working alone!" Detective Pikachu yelled angrily to the kid,...
body:
“Partners?! I don’t need another partner, I’m perfectly fine working alone!” Detective Pikachu yelled angrily to the kid, slamming his half empty Poke Beer on the bar counter and angrily skulking away to a corner of the bar, muttering darkly.

“"Another” Partner?“ The kid wondered out loud, stunned by the Talking Pokemon angry reaction.

"You have to excuse him…” the barman, a short… like, really short… guy?, with a blatantly fake moustache and a Brooklyn accent said with a sigh “Pikachu has never been the same since his trainer died” he said as he took back the miraculously intact Poke Beer Glass and started scrubbing it.

“Oh.” The kid could only say, his gaze now turning toward the Barman, “how… how did it happen, if I might ask?”

“Well, The twerp has always been a idiot, but he was a idiot with the third biggest heart I’ve ever seen, so, when he saw a war going on between a god and its clone, each fighting against each other for supremacy…” A wistful sigh, “… he couldn’t help but throw himself between them to beg them to stop.”

The kid’s eyes grew wide.

The barman looked back at the Pikachu, “Worst thing is, the Stupid twerp actually stopped the war with his sacrifice. They even made a statue for him in his home town, as if statues can give you your son or your friend or your trainer back” he turned again to the kid, tears shining in its unnaturally big eyes, “I think He even had your age when it happened”

“That’s why he doesn’t want another kid around, He doesn’t want to lose another friend like he did once before”

“Wow, I… I didn’t know that” the kid said, looking at his usually grumpy friend under a new light, as he looked back at him, now sitting on a booth near a window in the seedy bar, looking outside with a forlorn expression “That… must have been devastating for him.”

The barman, who had by now finished to clean the glass, could only sigh and agree with the kid with a sad, somewhat nostalgic…

“That’s Right.”
